sentence.Network_en: All he desired was to aggrandize his estate.
sentence.Network_cn: 他所希望的只是扩充他的家业.

sentence.Network_en: It would be the first time in human history that economic necessity has prevailed over military aggrandize-ment.
sentence.Network_cn: 那应该是人类历史上首次经济需要高于军事扩张。

sentence.Network_en: The dictator sought to aggrandize himself by new conquests.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个独裁者企图通过新的征服来扩大自己的权势。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... agenda ? n. 议程 aggrandize ? vt. 增加,夸大 aggravate ? vt. 加重，恶化.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... agglomerate v． 凝聚，结块 aggrandize v． 增大，扩张 aggravate v． 加重，恶化.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... aggression 侵略，进攻 aggrandize 扩大 aggravate 恶化.
英语常见词根前缀后缀大全 ... asocial 不好社交的 aggrandize 增大 aggravate 加重.

list.abs: measure of aggrandize emergency room quality management ., 加强急诊质量管理的措施.
this ambitious youngster sought to aggrandize himself ., 这位野心勃勃的年轻人企图加强自己的势力.
The king sought to aggrandize himself ., 国王企图增强自己的势力.
the concept of ruling aggrandized to build a socialist legal state ;, 强化法治理念 , 建设社会主义法治国家;
measure of aggrandize emergency room quality management ., 加强急诊质量管理的措施.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent. (in the general sense 'increase, magnify'): from French agrandiss-, lengthened stem of agrandir, probably from Italian aggrandire, from Latin grandis 'large'. The ending was changed by association with verbs ending in -ize

entry.tran: 吹捧;抬高（地位）；使…更辉煌
entry.def: To aggrandize someone means to make them seem richer, more powerful, and more important than they really are. To aggrandize a building means to make it more impressive.

example.ex: At the dinner table, my father would go on and on, showing off, aggrandising himself...
example.tran: 我父亲在餐桌上总是滔滔不绝地炫耀并吹嘘自己。

stems_affixes.word_buile: ad加强[有"向"之意+vert转+ize……化,做等→使转向→[做广告]使其注意……
ag一再+grand大+ize……化,做等→一再大→扩大[权力]等
civil公民的+ize……化,做等→v.使开化,使文明,教化
critic批评家+ize……化,做等→v.[criticise]批评,评论
ex出+orc巫术,邪魔+ize……化,做等→v.驱魔,去除[坏念头等]
fertile肥沃的+ize表动词→v.使受精;施肥于,使肥沃
general总的,大体的+ize……化,做等→v.归纳,概括,推广,普及
lion狮子+ize……化,做等→把人当狮子一样看→崇拜
material物质+ize……化,做等→v.赋予形体,实现
neutral中间的,中和的+ize……化,做等→v.使无效,中和
popular流行的+ize…化,使…→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广
public公众的+ize……化,做等→v.宣传,引人注意

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使复活,使重新充满活力
stems_affixes.word_buile: re重新+vital生命的+ize……化,做等→重新活
steril无菌的+ize……化,做等→v.使不育,杀菌
tempor时间+ize……化→时间化→拖延时间

means.word_mean: 扩大某人的权力,提高某人的地位,增加某人的财富

sentences.en: The dictator sought to aggrandize himself by new conquests.
sentences.cn: 这个独裁者企图通过新的征服来扩大自己的权势。

sentences.en: She often aggrandizes herself and disparages her colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她经常吹嘘自己而贬低同事。
